projects.welcomeTutorialTitle: Welcome to Your Project Management Hub
projects.welcomeTutorialDescription: Let's explore the three powerful ways to view and organize your photography projects.
projects.boardViewDescription: Try dragging a project from one column to another to see how the board view works.
projects.boardViewTooltip: Drag a project from one column to another to continue
projects.listViewDescription: Click the 'List' tab above to see detailed project information in a table format.
projects.listViewContent: The list view is perfect when you need to see detailed information about multiple projects at once, with sorting and filtering capabilities. This view is great for analyzing project data and making informed decisions.
projects.listViewTooltip: Click on the List tab above to continue
projects.archivedDescription: Click the 'Archived' tab above to see how completed projects are organized.
projects.archivedContent: The archived view keeps your workspace clean by separating completed projects from active ones. This helps you focus on current work while keeping past projects accessible for reference and portfolio building.
projects.archivedTooltip: Click on the Archived tab above to continue
projects.completionContent: You now know how to navigate between different project views. Each view has its strengths - use the board for workflow management, the list for detailed analysis, and archived for completed projects.
projects.pageSubtitle: Manage all your projects in one place

dangerZone.description: These actions are destructive and cannot be undone. Proceed with caution.
dangerZone.delete_description: Permanently remove all your data from our servers
dangerZone.delete_warning: This action will permanently delete all of your leads, projects, sessions, reminders, payments, and associated data. This action cannot be undone and all data will be lost forever.

dangerZone.delete_complete_desc: All your data has been permanently deleted.
